jobDescription: Job Description: DJO’s Master Data Analyst is responsible for maintaining accurate and current system parameters in ORACLE and Rapid Response related to Supply Chain. They will be the subject matter expert for all Master data related supply chain issues partnering with Demand Planning and Master scheduling to ensure consistency and accuracy. ORACLE and Rapid Response systems need to be aligned to deliver the best signals to our Supply Chain teams to ensure we meet DJO’s Customer Experience and Cash flow goals. Key job dutiesMaintain supply chain parameters in ORACLE and Rapid Response for Global Supply Chain.Consult on Supply Chain projects as a Subject Matter expertDevelop data audit reports and Root Cause corrective action process to fix errorsAssist with supply chain aspects of the New Product creation process, documentation and training for the Master scheduler and Demand PlannerDefine processes, procedures & policies for data management & support overall supply chain strategies/policiesPartner with our AGILE and Document Control teams on data validation and changes to ORACLE.Work with our IT team to stay up to date on system changes and support from a Master Data standpointKey stakeholdersManufacturing Production control and execution teamsDemand PlanningDistributionCustomer CareR&D;/ EngineeringContinuity of Supply team (Raw Material purchasing)MarketingInternational supply chainITDocument Control (QA/RA)Experience / skills required Bachelors Degree in a supply chain / engineering / science / IT or related field  At least 3 years experience in a Master data analyst role (Med Devices preferred)  Strong Excel capabilities  Experience with ORACLE and Rapid Response preferred  Able to parse data and make data driven decisions  Ability to lead small project teams to solve complex data issues  Ability to present confidently to all levels of management including senior leaders  Six Sigma / LEAN Experience preferred. ABOUT DJO GLOBAL DJO Global is a leading global developer, manufacturer and distributor of high-quality medical devices that provide solutions for musculoskeletal health, vascular health and pain management. Our products address the continuum of patient care from injury prevention to rehabilitation after surgery, injury or from degenerative disease, enabling people to regain or maintain their natural motion. Our products are used by orthopedic specialists, spine surgeons, primary care physicians, pain management specialists, physical therapists, podiatrists, chiropractors, athletic trainers and other healthcare professionals. In addition, many of our medical devices and related accessories are used by athletes and patients for injury prevention and at-home physical therapy treatment. Product lines include rigid and soft orthopedic bracing, hot and cold therapy, bone growth stimulators, vascular therapy systems and compression garments, therapeutic shoes and inserts, electrical stimulators used for pain management and physical therapy products. Our surgical division offers a comprehensive suite of reconstructive joint products for the hip, knee and shoulder. Our products are marketed under a portfolio of brands including Aircast®, Chattanooga, CMF™, Compex®, DonJoy®, ProCare®, Exos™, Dr. Comfort®, DonJoy Performance® and DJO® Surgical.  For additional information on the Company, please visit www.DJOglobal.com.
